entry.title: A Taste Of What He's Been Missing In His Life
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,861Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: Derek Hale has built a life around duty and family. A former high school basketball star, he married his sweetheart Paige Krasikeva right after graduation when she got pregnant with their son. Now in his late twenties, Derek works long hours as a mechanic, fixing cars to cover his family's needs. Paige stays home, but their marriage has been strainedâ€”Derek's absences, Paige's frustrations, and the weight of young parenthood have chipped away at what once felt like destiny. One night, after a brutal argument, Paige confesses to a one-night stand with a charming policeman named Stiles. entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,705Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 72

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is powerâ€”and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, heâ€™s determined to protect the Stilinski legacyâ€”even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale familyâ€”feared for their near-feral strengthâ€”emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a foxâ€™s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.title: Sugar High
entry.summary:
Author: Toki_Wrights

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,408Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 29

Summary: Are your intrusive thoughts supposed to, well, be that intrusive? Probably not, but surely there's no harm in it, right? Stiles stands at the roots of what must have once been a really fucking cool tree, but is now a stump, and pretends that he came here of his own accord, and that it wasn't the voice that made him start digging.
